# 6.0 Docs

## Globalization

- [Culture creation and case mapping in globalization-invariant mode](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/6.0/culture-creation-invariant-mode.md): Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 6 where the creation of new cultures is restricted and case mapping support extends to all characters in globalization-invariant mode.
